Posts.Content: Hi Sharon, I felt the same way.  I thought about not going to my last treatment, but I did.  That was 2 years ago.  I am not sure that I have wonderful words of wisdom.  I will say that I understand how you are feeling. I am sending you strength, good vibes and a ((BIG HUG))!  I hope you make the right decision for you on Monday!!!
Posts.Title: I need encouragement to go to chemo on monday
